VA - This Is Soul 2007 [EAC-FLAC](oan)

 
http://images.geotorrents.ge/images/85794043210670616196.png

Comes in gatefold cardboard sleeve.

Re-Mastered At Metropolis.

This is an expanded reissue of the UK Atlantic compilation LP This Is Soul.
The first twelve tracks comprised the original LP. The additional 17 tracks
have been newly selected to fit the spirit of the original LP.
